page.title: 15A Typical Day
page.content: I get up in the morning, I have a wash and brush my teeth. I spend about ten minutes and five to get dressed. Then I go downstairs and have cereal, I eat that, then have two slices of toast. I turn on the television. I watch that, and my dad might say we are going out. When we come back I would find something to eat, read my book, for about an hour. I might go in my garden and play football. I come back inside and watch the television. I am usually bored so I read or write - scribble silly things. Then my dad asks me if I want a game of snooker on my snooker table. We play about three games. Then at about 11.00pm my dad might say, "Time for bed Simon".
